name: COVID-19 RAT Result Questionnaire
title: COVID-19 RAT Result Questionnaire
description: Complete this form to notify Health New Zealand | Te Whatu Ora of COVID-19 rapid antigen test (RAT) results
purpose: Complete this form to notify Health New Zealand | Te Whatu Ora of COVID-19 rapid antigen test (RAT) results

item.text: This report is confidential, and your/the patient's information will be kept safe in accordance with the New Zealand Privacy Act.
When we collect your/the patient's information, we can only use it for the purposes for which it was collected.  For COVID RAT tests, this means we will only use the information to:
● Inform you about your/the patient's COVID-19 status
● Inform your/the patient's enrolled general practice team and general practitioner (where applicable)
● Ensure accurate national reporting of COVID-19 results and informing decisions regarding New Zealand’s response to COVID-19.
● Perform anonymous statistical analysis and research purposes in line with usual processes and where permitted by the Privacy Act 2020 and Health Information Privacy Code 2020.
We may need to share some of your/the patient's personal information with other agencies for health purposes and to ensure we meet our legal obligations.
If you would like more information about how your/the patient's personal information is managed, please go to the Te Whatu Ora website, and look for our ‘privacy & security’ webpage.
Do you wish to continue and consent to collection of your/the patient's information?
Who are you receiving this RAT report from?
Enter the mobile number for further communications related to this RAT report
The COVID-19 antigen was detected, which indicates the patient might be positive for COVID-19.
The COVID-19 antigen was not detected which indicates the patient is likely to be negative for COVID-19.
